text: James Ehleringer is an American biologist and Distinguished Professor of at the University of Utah. He is an elected member of the US National Academy of Sciences, a Fellow of the American Geophysical Union, Ecological Society of America, and American Association for Advancement of Science.AGU (2016), Honoring Earth and space scientists, Eos, 97, https://doi.org/10.1029/2016EO056319. Published on 25 July 2016. He is an ISI Highly Cited researcher. ==References== Category:Living people Category:University of Utah faculty Category:Members of the United States National Academy of Sciences Category:Fellows of the American Geophysical Union Category:Fellows of the American Association for the Advancement of Science Category:San Diego State University alumni Category:Stanford University alumni Category:Highly Cited Researchers Category:Fellows of the Ecological Society of America Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: James Ehleringer
